title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module is utilizing the Class.forName() method.
EB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module should not use the Class.forName() method.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BidiUtil class in the win32 module.
2. Look for the usage of the Class.forName() method.
3. Change the line above the usage to: 'static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);'
